page.title: 04LANCER BOSS-Fork lift trucks
page.content: Lancer Boss is owned by Sir Neville Bowman-Shaw and his brother and was formed 25 years ago in London before moving to Dunstable and then to their present buildings on Grovebury Road. The firm, which specialises in the production of fork lift trucks, operated from a number of sites along this road. The models produced, range from all the 'N' and 'R' series to the large 'D' and 'G' series at Â£250,000 per unit - sold mainly abroad. the main production takes place on sites 3 and 7 whilst exerimental work is carried out at site 2. the head office and design department are to be found at Ridgeway Court. the firm employs about 500 at Leighton Buzzard but has a number of smaller units in other parts of the country as well as a Sister factory at Steinboc in West Germany.
